link_desc:
A Zabbix template that detects the number of Nvidia GPUs and then creates items and graphs for them, as well as a few triggers, including for temperature, fan speed, power draw, free, used and total memory.

Intended for mining monitoring.

Tested on Zabbix-server 3.0.7 on a raspbian (debian variant) and on a Zabbix-agent 2.4.7 on a modified for mining Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS (simple mining's OS) and on a Zabbix-agent 3.0.4 on a Windows 8.1.

More details, screenshots, as well as instructions on how to use it can be found on the github page.
